document_data.mainbody:
ost Princess Road was a ballad penned by an unknown author about the mysterious disappearance of Princess Darseera from the gardens of her fortified home in the Purple Hills sometime in the third century before Dalereckoning began.A likely candidate is the Year of the Lost Princess, −261 DR, but the source does not state this explicitly. The stanza that prevented her name from being lost in the mists of time was
The ballad that commemorated the vanishing of Princess Darseera also lent its name to the network of portals into which she apparently stumbled on the night of her disappearance—the Lost Princess Road.
